message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm willing to sell to you for $120. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $105 for it. Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $105 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $115. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
